00045         public DataSet DataSource

00054         public string ReportType
00055         {
00056             get {   return type;    }
00057             set
00058             {
00059                 type = value;
00060 
00061                 DataGrid1.Columns[0].HeaderText = value + " Name";
00062 
00063                 if (value.Equals(ProjectItem.ItemType.TASK))
00064                     return;
00065 
00066                 //HyperLinkColumn col = (HyperLinkColumn) DataGrid1.Columns[0];
00067                 HyperLinkColumn col = new HyperLinkColumn();
00068                 col.HeaderText = DataGrid1.Columns[0].HeaderText;
00069                 col.DataTextField = "name";
00070                 col.DataNavigateUrlField = "id";
00071 
00072                 // set item type to be displayed
00073                 string item = "";
00074 
00075                 if (value.Equals(ProjectItem.ItemType.PROJECT))
00076                     item = ProjectItem.ItemType.MODULE;
00077                 else if(value.Equals(ProjectItem.ItemType.MODULE))
00078                     item = ProjectItem.ItemType.TASK;                
00079 
00080                 col.DataNavigateUrlFormatString = Request.ApplicationPath + "/PM/Projects.aspx?item="+item+"&id={0}";
00081                 DataGrid1.Columns.Remove(DataGrid1.Columns[0]);
00082                 DataGrid1.Columns.AddAt(0, col);
00083             }
00084         }
00085     }
